Name: Let Chat Guess
About the game: In Let Chat Guess, the goal of the game is simple, be the one who guesses the closest distance that the catapulted character will travel! Put your Twitch chat and/or friends to the test and let them try to guess the correct distance! You don't have to be a Streamer to play the game! Solo player ? No worries! Try to climb the rankings and get on top of the leaderboards! There are 3 unique catapults which are all physics based ! Choose between multiple characters with different attributes!
Meta Title: Let Chat Guess: Dec 15, 2022, Kilz Knight and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Let Chat Guess? Check out the release date (Dec 15, 2022), developer insights from Kilz Knight, and a complete game summary.
